greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Euler totient function phi applied to the n-th squarefree number.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
D. R. Ward, Some Series Involving Euler's Function, Journal of the London Mathematical Society, Vol. 1, No. 4 (1927), pp. 210-214.
formula: Lim_{n->oo} Sum_{k=1..n} 1/a(k) - log(a(n)) = A083343 (Ward, 1927). - _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 05 2021
example: The 12th squarefree number is 17 and phi(17) is 16, so a(12)=16.
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for(n=1, nn, if (issquarefree(n), print1(eulerphi(n), ", ")));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 12 2015
a049200 n = product $ map (subtract 1) $ a265668_row n
results.author: _Labos Elemer_
